name: angry-cow-54
author: andrew-demchenk0
description: angry-cow-54 组件 (icon, animation, red, button, opacity, pause, big, interactive)

uniapp.template:
<button class="button"></button>
  <view class="svg-icon" fill="none" height="24" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><g stroke="#ff2849" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-width="2"><rect height="14" rx="1.5" width="3" x="15" y="5"></rect><rect height="14" rx="1.5" width="3" x="6" y="5"></rect></g></view>
  <text class="label">Pause</text>
</button>
